title.narrative: Entrepre. prom. & young people job creation in Bur. 2 year

description.narrative:
Those activities will have as results:
In Gitega province 30 young people from Gitega are identified in order to be trained on management of SMEs. 30 young people from Gitega are trained on management of SMEs. 30 young people from Gitega have competences on the creation, the startup and growth of the enterprises 30 young people of Gitega are technically assisted by experts of REJA and 30 business plans are well elaborated. 30 SMEs belonging to young people of Gitega are coached, registred in Burundi Revenue Office, pay taxes and are normally managed.
II. In Bujumbura mayorship 25 young people from Bujumbura have competences on the creation, the startup and growth of the enterprises. 30 young people of Bujumbura are technically assisted by experts of REJA and 30 business plans are well elaborated. 30 SMEs belonging to young people of Bujumbura are coached, registred in Burundi Revenue Office, pay taxes and are normally managed. The 15 best business plans are retained and published after competition. The 2 best business plans are financially supplied. A workshop to plead for the improvement of business environment is organized and animated.
